<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Perfect Ki Adept](/Feats.aspx?ID=902) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 83 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Student of Perfection](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=18)

**Prerequisites**
[Student of Perfection Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=900)

</column>

---

You gain the appropriate ki spell for your School of Perfection: [_unblinking flame revelation_](/Spells.aspx?ID=543) for Unblinking Flame, [_unbreaking wave advance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=544) for Unbreaking Waves, [_unfolding wind rush_](/Spells.aspx?ID=545) for Unfolding Wind, or [_untwisting iron buffer_](/Spells.aspx?ID=546) for Untwisting Iron. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
name: Perfect Ki Adept
